name: Elements of Attrition
description:
V1

Click, drag, and launch your blue orbs into red ones to spread your element. Knock as many orbs off screen as you can to destroy them and increase your final score.

This game was made in a week as a personal challenge, and I plan to further complete this game at a later date.

Thanks to:

Albarnie - Support with shaders
Wokarol - Avid motivator
Dan - Avid tester
